channel.title: Cache downloading bar
channel.description:
When the client is downloading the cache for some reason it doesn't show the loading bar for some strange reason. The loading bar at the moment is custom but i would of thought it would revert to the default for the cache downloading?
( I'm terrible with clients )
Any help is appreciated
http://prntscr.com/5cd75i
If any ideas add my skype: mrzeus6
